survey_brief: This survey aims to understand preferences and challenges related to eco-friendly commuting options among urban professionals.

questions.question_text: Which of the following eco-friendly commuting options do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Electric scooter or bike (shared or personal)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture diverse commuting habits. Ensure options are mutually exclusive where possible.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkbox). Randomize answer options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following eco-friendly commuting options do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Electric scooter or bike (shared or personal)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose eco-friendly commuting options?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 ≠ 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for qualitative insights. Consider a single-choice format for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio button) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose eco-friendly commuting options?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 ≠ 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using eco-friendly commuting options more frequently? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format with a limit of 3 selections to prioritize barriers. Randomize options to avoid order bias.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using eco-friendly commuting options more frequently? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to switch to an eco-friendly commuting option if your employer offered financial incentives (e.g., subsidies, rewards)?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measurable insights. Include a 'Neutral' midpoint to avoid forced responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio button). Display options vertically.

script.question_text: How likely are you to switch to an eco-friendly commuting option if your employer offered financial incentives (e.g., subsidies, rewards)?

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use eco-friendly commuting options more often? (Open-ended)
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character limit validation.

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use eco-friendly commuting options more often? (Open-ended)
